data.why:
Goal/Idea: Why not contribute/share some (extractions) of my custom
    scripts to/with "everyone" - i.e. the free software community ?

    Main focus are custom technical applications and tools. (Since i am
    working both as programmer and PCB-Layouter) Thus i guess the first
    contributed script/module would be something around dataconversion
    for EDA-Tools (i have found something for GDS2 but nothing for
    Gerber and Excellon and others now ....)
